about_the_game:
The demo includes:

1. Unlockable plots 1, 2, and 3

2. Up to 6 unlockable villagers

3. A maximum of 1 farmland

4. A maximum of 1 furnace and 1 mill

5. Exploration of up to 5 levels of the mine

6. At least 50 quests to complete

7. Full crafting and processing features included

Complete Game Description:

·Resource Gathering

Players need to diligently collect various resources, such as wood and ores. Venture deep into dark and dangerous mines, explore every corner of the village and islands, and obtain valuable resources.

·Crop Cultivation

Purchase your favorite crop seeds from merchants, carefully plant and tend to them. Once the crops mature, harvest and process them to boost the village's productivity.

·Crafting and Processing

Use the collected resources to craft equipment, food, and medicine needed by the villagers. The village also has many processing buildings that can be accessed by unlocking plots, further enhancing production efficiency.

·Building and Upgrading

Every villager has a cozy home. Players can upgrade buildings and purchase furniture to create a more comfortable living environment, increasing the villagers' happiness.

·Combat

Goblins and skeletons are lurking in various areas. Defeat these enemies in battle to gain valuable loot and reclaim treasure chests and lands they have occupied, expanding the village's territory.

short_description: This is a casual adventure simulation game where you'll manage a small village and explore dark mines. Upgrade villagers and buildings, craft equipment and food, defeat evil goblins, and reclaim lost lands.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
